Text:
You are dedicated in your uploading and, since I am new at torrents and found yours just recently, you have a new fan.  I'll seed this as long as I can.

You wouldn't happen to have The Adams Chronicles, would you? Mid-70s - PBS. Haven't located it here.

Thanks!
I think I know someone who has that - let me check and see if he has, and if I can borrow a copy.
A nice piece of dramatized history, and it reflects very well the 1776 part of your username. Thank you!!

The Adams Chronicles are up:
